items.label: lem-location-error-drift-kinetic
items.title: Drift of Location Error Under Kinetics
items.content:
1463: :label: lem-location-error-drift-kinetic
1464: 
1465: The location error $V_{\text{loc}} = \|\Delta\mu_x\|^2 + \lambda_v\|\Delta\mu_v\|^2 + b\langle\Delta\mu_x, \Delta\mu_v\rangle$ satisfies:
1466: 
1467: $$
1468: \mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{loc}}] \leq -\left[\frac{\alpha_{\text{eff}}}{2} + \gamma \lambda_v - \frac{b^2}{4\lambda_v}\right] V_{\text{loc}} \tau + C_{\text{loc}}' \tau
1469: 
1470: $$
1471: 
1472: where:
1473: - $\alpha_{\text{eff}} = \alpha_{\text{eff}}(\gamma, \alpha_U, L_F, \sigma_{\min})$ is the effective contraction rate from hypocoercivity (not requiring convexity)
1474: - $C_{\text{loc}}' = O(\sigma_{\max}^2 + n_{\text{status}})$ accounts for noise and status changes
items.raw_directive:
1460: ### 4.5. Location Error Drift
1461: 
1462: :::{prf:lemma} Drift of Location Error Under Kinetics
1463: :label: lem-location-error-drift-kinetic
1464: 
1465: The location error $V_{\text{loc}} = \|\Delta\mu_x\|^2 + \lambda_v\|\Delta\mu_v\|^2 + b\langle\Delta\mu_x, \Delta\mu_v\rangle$ satisfies:
1466: 
1467: $$
1468: \mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{loc}}] \leq -\left[\frac{\alpha_{\text{eff}}}{2} + \gamma \lambda_v - \frac{b^2}{4\lambda_v}\right] V_{\text{loc}} \tau + C_{\text{loc}}' \tau
1469: 
1470: $$
1471: 
1472: where:
1473: - $\alpha_{\text{eff}} = \alpha_{\text{eff}}(\gamma, \alpha_U, L_F, \sigma_{\min})$ is the effective contraction rate from hypocoercivity (not requiring convexity)
1474: - $C_{\text{loc}}' = O(\sigma_{\max}^2 + n_{\text{status}})$ accounts for noise and status changes
1475:

items.label: lem-structural-error-drift-kinetic
items.title: Drift of Structural Error Under Kinetics
items.content:
1724: :label: lem-structural-error-drift-kinetic
1725: 
1726: The structural error $V_{\text{struct}} = W_h^2(\tilde{\mu}_1, \tilde{\mu}_2)$ (Wasserstein distance between centered measures) satisfies:
1727: 
1728: $$
1729: \mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{struct}}] \leq -\kappa_{\text{struct}} V_{\text{struct}} \tau + C_{\text{struct}}' \tau
1730: 
1731: $$
items.raw_directive:
1721: ### 4.6. Structural Error Drift
1722: 
1723: :::{prf:lemma} Drift of Structural Error Under Kinetics
1724: :label: lem-structural-error-drift-kinetic
1725: 
1726: The structural error $V_{\text{struct}} = W_h^2(\tilde{\mu}_1, \tilde{\mu}_2)$ (Wasserstein distance between centered measures) satisfies:
1727: 
1728: $$
1729: \mathbb{E}[\Delta V_{\text{struct}}] \leq -\kappa_{\text{struct}} V_{\text{struct}} \tau + C_{\text{struct}}' \tau
1730: 
1731: $$
1732:
